stimulusHtml: The depiction of the scene in the engraving best illustrates which of the following aspects of the French aristocracy under Louis XIV’s rule?

features.html:
The Capture of Namur, engraving by an unknown artist, 1692

Tallandier/Bridgeman Images

The engraving shows the French army’s siege and capture of the town of Namur, in the Spanish Netherlands, from Spanish and Dutch forces during the Nine Years’ War. Louis XIV is shown in the center, surrounded by his son and various members of the nobility.

choicesHtml: The maintenance of the aristocracy’s privileged social position
The financial difficulties experienced by many members of the aristocracy in attempting to support their lifestyle
The displacement of the aristocracy from many key administrative posts
The continued rivalries among aristocratic factions seeking royal favor
